Reviews.Title: Good Cheap and works
Reviews.Author: Gadgets & Gizmos
Reviews.Content: These cables were perfect for an office installation. The cables that came with our LOREX camera kit from costco were way too short. Bought 6 of these and had no problems at all. Gauge of the cables was pretty thin so I docked it one star.

ProductInfo.Features:
150FT Black Cable for both video and power cable
Works with cameras that have DC power only
Included: BNC/Power Cable and 2 BNC/RCA adapters
ProductInfo.Name: Menotek 150FT Video Power BNC RCA Cable for CCTV Security Cameras
